Package com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity.signing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ErpQuerySigner
    Interface for classes that allow to sign ERP queries.
    ErpQuerySignerFactory
    Represents a factory for ErpQuerySigner based on a given SigningAlgorithm.
    SignatureKeyProvider

    StrategyBasedErpQuerySignerFactory
    Implementation of ErpQuerySignerFactory based on a ErpQuerySigningStrategy.
    TrustSignatureKey
    Holds the private key for the ERP query trust signature key.
